partNumberNote: Most Prius models use part 86271-0E077. Check the label on your existing card to confirm.
installGuide: 1. Turn off engine. 2. Locate SD card slot (usually below screen or in center console). 3. Eject old card. 4. Insert new card firmly. 5. Start engine â€” allow 2-3 minutes for maps to load.
warning: Only works for vehicles with factory-installed navigation. Base trims without factory nav do not have a card slot.
